Others: Bowden Francis pitched 5 1/3 no-hit innings before allowing a hit in the 6th inning.
Francis struck out 5 batters and walked none in his outing.
The Blue Jays took the lead in the 3rd inning with a run and made it 2-0 in the 6th.
Kutter Crawford held Toronto to 2 runs on 6 hits in 6 2/3 innings for the Red Sox.
Rich Hill made his 2024 debut for the Blue Jays.
